column5: To all the OFC community (and especially to our friends behind the scenes keeping this site up and running !), to your families and those close to you - A VERY MERRY CHRISTMAS AND ALL THE VERY BEST FOR 2007 !!!   ... the challenge now is to decide whether each of us go into to every one elses threads and respond directly ... or whether we need a generic post we can all add our little 'card' to.   So much cheer .. so little time
